import React from 'react' import { Form, Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card, ListGroupItem} from "react-bootstrap" import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useLocation, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux" import Message from "../components/Message" import Loader from "../components/Loader" import CheckoutStep from '../components/CheckoutStep' function PlaceOrderScreen() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart) return ( <>

Shipping

Address : {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode} {cart.shippingAddress.country}

Payment

Payment Method : {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? Cart is Empty : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item,index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} * {item.price} =${item.qty * item.price} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Items ${cart.itemsPrice} ) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
